湯同學：國安法對社會氛圍有很大幫助

考獲 44 分、獲美國杜克大學錄取修讀物理的湯同學則表示，國安法是中央對香港的政治表態，「上年好多嘅違法行為係唔需要國安法，佢哋都係違法，中央係唔會縱容。」他指中央是次的表態非常清晰，相信對香港整個社會氛圍有很大的幫助，「法治係行先過自由，有法律保障、不侵犯他人嘅自由先係真正的自由，喺一國兩制的框架下，有一國嘅安定先有繁榮嘅穩定」。

他希望，留學後可以回來香港發展，暫不考慮移民，「香港係我屋企，希望用我教育、大學嘅知識去回饋香港嘅社會，去參加政府嘅諮詢委員會」，通過正式的渠道去正面地改善香港的現況。

興德學校校監湯修齊：請還興德平靜教育空間

感謝興德學校全體教職員為了學生的學習，學校持續的發展，在本學年制定了新的學校發展計劃，並按計劃一步一步推行，雖不能說在短短一個學期內，便有很顯著的成效，但是我感受到各位對學校的愛，謝謝您們。

可惜學校不斷收到「匿名」的投訴信，內容有關於學生事務，有關於行政安排的，林林總總。每當收到投訴信時，我第一時間都會勉勵您們反省學校是否有所不足，程序或行政安排是否有改善空間，從中我看到您們盡心及努力去改善問題。

遺憾的是，投訴者似乎對您們所付出的努力視若無睹，反之，投訴變本加厲，內容失實、惡意中傷。同時，投訴信已不是寄往法團校董會或教育局，而是直接寄往不同的傳媒機構，顯而易見，投訴者的目的不是改善學校，而是只想將事情交予外界不公平地公審。

小學階段是孩子們學習的黃金時期，學校是培育孩子的地方，一個寧靜，愉快的校園環境對孩子學習至為重要。

我明白、了解您們因為這持續不斷的投訴而疲於奔命，既要向校董會撰寫報告，又害怕明天會否在報章或電視新聞上「看到自己」，這不單對您們個人造成巨大的精神壓力，相信對各位的家庭亦造成莫大的困擾。

我無法猜度投訴者的目的及意圖，我亦無法阻止投訴者的行為，我唯一可以做的，或我作為校監必須要做的，就是希望能藉著這封公開信，衷心表達我對您們在這艱難的時期，仍緊守崗位，為學生、為學校而付出的努力的敬意，及致以最真誠的感謝！近日教育界乃多事之秋，教師們承受了不少的壓力，相信您們更甚，我希望透過以公開信的形式，為您們打氣，希望興德的同事們，能感受到我與一眾校董的心意！

小學階段是孩子們學習的黃金時期，學校是培育孩子的地方，一個寧靜，愉快的校園環境對孩子學習至為重要，無謂的紛爭只會損害孩子的學習，我謹此期盼大眾還教師一個平靜的教學空間；還孩子一個寧靜、愉快的學習環境。

建議Subject
Request for Reconsideration of Admission/Visa Application of Tong Tak On


Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to express my concern about the integrity of Tong Tak On from Diocesan Boys’ School, one of your students-to-be.

According to a recent article featuring students with outstanding performance in the International Baccalaureate by Stand News (A Hong Kong-based news platform), Mr. Tong Tak On, a student from Diocesan Boys' School,HK who scores a total of 44 marks and be accepted by the Duke University claimed that THE NATIONAL SECURITY LAW WILL IMPROVE THE SOCIAL ENVIRONMENT OF HONG KONG. The National Security Law, is an unjust law that deprives Hong Kongers of their basic rights and freedoms which has been condemned by the head of different states.

Tong, the son of a committee member of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference also claimed that THE RULE BY LAW HAS PRECEDENCE OVER FREEDOM, and ON THE BASIS OF THE “ONE COUNTRY TWO SYSTEM” PRINCIPLE , PROSPERITY AND STABILITY WILL ONLY BE ESTABLISHED WHEN THE COUNTRY’S SECURITY IS GUARANTEED.

It is my deepest concern that accepting a student who supports the suppression of basic human rights will possibly damage the reputation of your school. Meanwhile, I sincerely suspect that he may be involved in spying activity while studying in your school, as his father is one of the committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference. Therefore, it is hope that the admission of Mr Tong could be reconsidered seriously.

Enclosed please find the reference of his claim.

Thank you.

Yours faithfully,
XXX

I am writing to express my concern about the integrity of Tong Tak On from Diocesan Boys’ School, which will soon start his tertiary education in the States.

According to a recent article featuring students with outstanding performance in the International Baccalaureate by Stand News (A Hong Kong-based news platform), Mr. Tong Tak On, a student from Diocesan Boys' School,HK who scores a total of 44 marks and be accepted by the Duke University claimed that THE NATIONAL SECURITY LAW WILL IMPROVE THE SOCIAL ENVIRONMENT OF HONG KONG. The National Security Law, is an unjust law that deprives Hong Kongers of their basic rights and freedoms which has been condemned by the head of different states.

Tong, the son of a committee member of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference also claimed that THE RULE BY LAW HAS PRECEDENCE OVER FREEDOM, and ON THE BASIS OF THE “ONE COUNTRY TWO SYSTEM” PRINCIPLE , PROSPERITY AND STABILITY WILL ONLY BE ESTABLISHED WHEN THE COUNTRY’S SECURITY IS GUARANTEED.

It is my deepest concern that approving the VISA application of a student who supports the suppression of basic human rights will possibly pose threat to your country. Meanwhile, I sincerely suspect that he may be involved in spying activity while studying in your school, as his father is one of the committees of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference. Therefore, it is hope that the VISA application of Mr Tong could be reconsidered seriously. And if the application has been approved already, I hope the VISA can be revoked promptly.

Enclosed please find the reference of his claim.

Thank you.

Yours faithfully,
XXX

【修例風波】湯修齊指大專教育德育有不足 要加強「先教做人再教知識」信念

反修例風波衝突加劇，家庭與學校合作事宜委員會主席湯修齊在出席電台節目時表示，近幾個月社會事件，令他發現大專教育在德育上有所不足，強調校長及校董要加強「先教學生做人，再教知識」的信念。

湯修齊表示，自己早前在大學校董會上已經有提出德育教育的重要性，大學有責任培養學生正向的價值觀，認同相比起知識，教懂學生待人處事比較重要。

委員會委員方奕展強調，家庭對青年成長很重要，認為如果家長與子女溝通得好，有助改善社會情緒。他又指，家長體諒大學校長不容易，校長一定不是普通人，其身教很重要，期望他們能在事件中表現出文人風骨。

浸會大學持續教育學院副院長李南玉就指，對過去一周發生的事件感到心痛，強調家長教導子女並非只追求知識，而是讓子女從錯誤中學習和成長。她又認為家長的眼界以及一言一行，都會對子女造成影響，父母亦要接受自己的不完美，自身需要成長。

https://hd.stheadline.com/news/realtime/hk/1638940/即時-港聞-修例風波-湯修齊指大專教育德育有不足-要加強-先教做人再教知識-信念

請幫我開新POST/樓主PIN在樓頂，方便大家去美國移民局USCIS舉報港奸湯德安冚家紅四代。寫信給美國大學唔係最直接，因為簽證係移民局發比學校，再由學校寄比國際生。所以大家向移民局的反人權調查小組舉報先有用！當然可以Send 埋EMAIL 比學校就最好啦。請動動手指，做以下三步：


Step 1 輸入電郵地址： HRV.ICE@ice.dhs.gov

Step 2 剪貼標題：Please Investigate and Void the F-1 VISA of Human Right Violator, Harris Tak On TONG (HK Citizen)

Step 2.5 （可做可不做） 附加圖片及檔案：

Introduction to Wai Ki Tong and Kwok Wah Tong http://www.daoist.org/booksearch/booksearch/list013/129-2.pdf

Step 3 剪貼以下所有內容，係下款換上你的大名，並按“發送”：

Dear USCIS Officer,

I am writing to bring to your attention that an F-1 visa holder from Hong Kong, Mr. Harris Tak On TONG 湯德安 (a.k.a Harris TONG), has publicly supported the implementation of the National Security Law in Hong Kong. Tong is admitted to Duke University’s in the new school year 2020-2021. His support to the National Security Law is causing my deep concern on the safety of the citizens in the United States.

The National Security Law is an unjust law which allows the China's Central Government in Beijing to establish a national security agency in Hong Kong and interrupt local political affairs in the name of "national security". The law was passed on June 30th, 2020 without the participation of the Hong Kong government or its citizens. It gives Beijing unlimited power to deprive Hong Kong people's freedom and human rights.

It is not a surprise for Tong's supports to the evil law as his family has been pro-Beijing since his great grandfather's era. His father, Henry Tong Sau-chai 湯修齊, is part of the committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference. His grandfather and great grandfather are Dr. Tong Wai Ki 湯偉奇 and Tong Kwok Wah 湯國華 respectively. Dr. Tong Wai Ki studied in Michigan University in 1959 and is also a member of the pro-Beijing committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

Harris Tong's support to the National Security Law violated the First Amendment in Bill of Rights that "Congress shall make no law respecting an establishment of religion, or prohibiting the free exercise thereof; or abridging the freedom of speech, or of the press; or the right of the people peaceably to assemble, and to petition the Government for a redress of grievances."

I am deeply concerned of America's safety with Harris Tong's anti-human and anti-freedom values. His study and presence in the United States will cause potential threat to the intellectual properties and public safety of the US. It is highly possible that he will follow his father and grandfather's footsteps to participate in pro-autocratic organizations, such as the above-mentioned committee, to suppress the human rights and freedom of Hong Kong people in the future.

I am regret to read his speech about supporting the evil law on the newspaper enclosed. It is sincerely hoped that you can make an investigation and take actions accordingly on the immigration and visa status of Tong and his families. Thank you for your attention and please do not hesitate to reach out to me through this email if further information is needed.


Yours faithfully,
XXX
A Freedom-loving Hong Konger
